language:
<entry name="ChaosSpaceMarines/convertWildlifeFlavor" value="“Your shrines will burn, your streets run with blood, your false idols shattered, your people slaughtered by the thousands, your very planet torn apart... and the barest fraction of my hatred will be satisfied.”
— Ba'ar Zul the Hate-Bound, Warrior of Khorne."/>
<entry name="Tyranids/convertWildlifeFlavor" value="“The Genestealers on this world have been preparing for our arrival for decades, centuries, perhaps even millenia. Let them now rejoice, and come to fuel the early days of our Feeding.“
— Unknown"/>
